Suddenly he saw how someone starred towards him

The woman picked him up in her hand and checked the sock. "Perfect" He heard her whisper. She then looked at the back for the price and said...
1121111.title: It was a 21 year old lady in her gymwear

12.content:
Josh had accepted a position at "Underwear Everywhere", a company that produced all different kinds of women's underwear. It was not his first choice for a job, but they were eager for new employees and were paying him more than anywhere else.

As he drove up to the factory, he was struck by the size of it all. The factor was huge, and there must of been hundreds of other people that worked here every day. It looks a while just for him to find a parking spot. Finally he parked and saw a sign with an arrow pointing to the new employee training office. He made his way there. Upon entering the office, he was greeted by an attractive receptionist. She must have been in her late-20's, she was dressed in a professional looking blouse and a short skirt. Her name tag had the name Cindy on it.

"You must be another one of the new trainees here for your first day", Cindy said. "I'll show you to the training room, the others are already here and training is just about to start."

"Thank you", Josh said.

Trying not to be distracted by Cindy's good looks, Josh quickly made his was to the back of the training room. He noticed a women in her mid-40's at the front of the room. She was dressing in a business suit that, while professional looking, also did little to hide the curves of her body. She was in great shape for her age. Josh couldn't help but think that this place was just filled with attractive woman.

"Welcome to Underwear Everywhere!", the woman said. "I am Barbara Gray. I am one of the product line managers. Since it is your first day, you will be watching a few orientation videos to help get you antiquated and teach you about proper safety practices. There is a lot of information to get through, so let's get started".

With that Barbara turned down the lights and turned on a projector that stated playing the first training video. During orientation, Josh mostly played on his phone. At one point, he did overhear the instructional video talking about a new process for making underwear from recycled objects, but he wasn't really paying attention. He figured he could just learn as he went.

After the video Barbara escorted the group to a balcony that oversaw one of the production lines for the factory. For the most part it looked like a regular clothing production line, but Josh noticed what looked like a large compactor at the starting end of it that employees were feeling what appeared to be recycled clothing and other material into.

Barbara once again addressed the group; "for your first week, you will all be training on the production line that I manage. I will be keeping an eye on you and will decide where you will work after this first week. I hope you all take the safety precautions from the training video seriously as you work this week. On this production line we take scrap materials and use a new patented process to made brand new _____"
12.title: Undewear Everywhere
